title: How to find the RBSE 10th results for 2020 - Quora

response.answer_text: Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education has declared the RBSE class 10 results. Students can check their results on official websites – 2019-20: Brought to you by NIC andrajeduboard.rajasthan.gov.in. State Education Minister Sh. Govind Singh Dotasara released the results of over 11.79 lakh (11,79,830). A total of 9.29 lakh (9,29,045) students cleared the RBSE 10th board exam successfully this year with 80.63 pass percent. The students can check their result at the official websites- http://rajeduboard.rajasthan.gov.in and 2019-20: Brought to you by NIC The RBSE Class 10 exam was scheduled to be held from March 14 to 27. However, some papers were postponed due to Coronavirus lockdown. The Rajasthan Board then conducted the remaining papers from June 27 to 30. A total of 11,79,830 students had appeared in the class 10 exams. How to check Rajasthan Board Class 10 result Visit the official RBSE website http://rajeduboard.rajasthan.gov.inOn the homepage, click on the link ‘ ‘RBSE 10th result 2020’’Enter your credentials to login and click on ‘Submit.’Your class 10 Result 2020 will be displayed on the screenDownload the RBSE class 10 result and take its print out for future references
